hypothesis_content.title: Crypto Volatility Compression Breakout with Macro Catalyst Alignment
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility compresses below 40% (25th percentile) during NEUTRAL regime, and subsequent expansion occurs alongside a positive macro catalyst (Fed dovish signal, ETF inflow spike >$200M), the breakout direction will be upward with 70% probability, yielding +6% returns over 4 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during neutral regimes represents coiled energy. Positive macro catalysts provide fundamental justification for directional breakout, attracting sidelined capital. ETF flows directly impact BTC supply/demand.
entry_conditions: Macro catalyst: Fed speech dovish OR daily ETF net inflow > $200M
Price breaks 5-day high on >15% volume spike
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If volatility expansion occurs but price moves downward >3% in >40% of historical instances with macro catalyst.
